ISSUE.TITLE: PDF invoice doesn't work for custom currencies (in debug mode)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.0 The RTM release appears to have introduced a bug. Unable to print PDF Invoice with custom currency symbol (e.g. INR or RUB). It was working fine in nopCommerce 4.60 (Beta). The issue was introduced in https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/6464. But please note that it doesn't work in "debug" configuration only. It works without any issues in "release" configuration. Anyway, it's better to disable exception even in the "debug" mode as well

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6473 Disabled throwing an exception when glyph is not available in debug mode
